metadata.description: Generates events (e.g., 'Order Placed', 'User Registered') and publishes them to EventBridge. Resides in private subnets for security.

metadata.description: Serverless event bus for routing events from sources to targets based on rules.

metadata.description: Buffers 'Order Placed' events for asynchronous processing, ensuring reliability and decoupling from the producer.

metadata.description: Serverless function subscribed directly to SNS for real-time processing of user events (e.g., sending welcome emails).

metadata.permissions: Allows Lambda to be invoked by SNS Topic and write logs to CloudWatch Logs.
